name: @dopt/check-formatting
description: A CLI for checking whether a package's files are formatted correctly

scripts.build: echo "@dopt/check-formatting does not require build"; exit 0;
scripts.clean: echo "@dopt/check-formatting does not require clean"; exit 0;
scripts.dev: echo "@dopt/check-formatting does not require dev"; exit 0;
scripts.format: echo "@dopt/check-formatting does not require test"; exit 0;
scripts.formatcheck: echo "@dopt/check-formatting does not require formatcheck"; exit 0;
scripts.lint: echo "@dopt/check-formatting does not require lint"; exit 0;
scripts.test: echo "@dopt/check-formatting does not require test"; exit 0;
scripts.typecheck: echo "@dopt/check-formatting does not require typecheck"; exit 0;
scripts.prepublishOnly: NODE_ENV=production pnpm -w exec turbo run build --filter="@dopt/check-formatting"
